writing_guidelines.description: Complete and consistent high-quality content drives sales, increases customer satisfaction, lowers return rates, and improves discoverability.
Content that provides complete, accurate, relevant, and engaging information.

summary: The content emphasizes the importance of high-quality product information, highlighting that good content can drive sales, enhance customer satisfaction, and improve product discoverability. It categorizes 'good' content as complete, accurate, relevant, and engaging.
